alert.note: Alert for Southampton; Sussex (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 14 at 3:43PM EDT until May 14 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL SOUTHAMPTON AND CENTRAL SUSSEX COUNTIES... At 343 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sussex, or 14 miles southwest of Waverly, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Homeville around 410 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Owens, Newville, Booker, Yale, Lumberton, Huske, Littleton and Hilda. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
